document_data.name: Sirvinhandra
document_data.mainbody: '''Sirvinhandra''' was a [[green dragon]] ([[great wyrm]]) who, on 22 Mirtul [[1373 DR]], emerged from a lair in the [[Dun Hills]] to attack the [[Abbey of the Just Hammer]], causing devastation, before being killed by Lord High Justiciar High Avenger [[Deren Eriach]].{{Cite dragon/Cormanthor: War Amidst the Trees|71}}
